programme.desc: The UEFA Conference League is the third-tier club football tournament organised by UEFA. The new format competition runs for its second season live and exclusive only on beIN. The RB Arena in Leipzig, Germany, is the venue for the Conference League final on 27 May 2026.

programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Alcaraz - Sinner: The Dawn of a New Tennis Era
programme.desc: Alcaraz – Sinner: The Dawn of a New Tennis Era explores the rise of these two stars, their paths to the top, and how their duels are redefining the sport in the post Big Three dominance. It’s a story of legacy, ambition, and the birth of a new golden age for tennis.

programme.desc: “ATP Tour This Week”It is comprised of the various feature stories created by ATP Media and ATP Tour

programme.title: Argentina vs Germany (QF4) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Spain vs Czechia (QF3) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Argentina vs Germany (QF4) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Gemma TRIAY PONS ESP Delfina BREA SENESI ARG vs Ariana SANCHEZ FALLADA ESP Paula JOSEMARIA MARTIN ES
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: France vs Belgium (QF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
programme.desc: The 2025 Davis Cup Final 8 runs 18–23 Nov at SuperTennis Arena, Bologna Fiere (indoor hard). Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

programme.title: Wales vs North Macedonia - UEFA European Qualifiers World Cup 2026 - MD10
programme.desc: The European section of the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualification competition will act as qualifiers for the 2026 FIFA World Cup, to be held in Canada, Mexico and the United States A total of 16 slots in the final tournament are available for UEFA teams.

programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) [1] vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) [2] - Nitto ATP Finals Turin - 2025
programme.desc: Set up No.1 Alcaraz vs No.2 Sinner. Pre-match, Alcaraz leads H2H 10–6 (hard 7–3, clay 3–1; Sinner edges grass 2–0). Indoor hard favors first-strike tennis and aggressive returns. Expect razor-thin margins as the season’s top two chase year-end supremacy and another chapter in a rivalry built on pace, precision, and momentum swings.

programme.title: Italy vs Uzbekistan - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 - PlayOff Tournament and European Play Off Draws
programme.desc: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off Draws The final pathways to the game-changing FIFA World Cup 2026™ will be mapped out when the draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and the European Play-Off draw takes place at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland. The draws will define the routes the 22 competing nations – six via the Play-Off Tournament and 16 through European Play-Off matches – will need to successfully navigate to seal a spot at the first-ever 48-team FIFA World Cup™, which will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the United States from Thursday, 11 June to Sunday, 19 July 2026.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off draws
programme.desc: The draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament, along with the European Play-Off draw, is scheduled to occur at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland, on Thursday, 20 November 2025. These draws will determine the routes for the 22 participating nations—six through the Play-Off Tournament and 16 via European Play-Off matches—who must successfully navigate these challenges to secure a place in the inaugural 48-team FIFA World Cup™.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. programme.title: CAF Awards 2025
programme.desc: The Confédération Africaine de Football (CAF) has unveiled the Top Three Nominees in each of the Men’s Categories of the highly anticipated CAF Awards 2025. The prestigious event will be held in Rabat, Morocco, on 19 November 2025, celebrating the exceptional performances and achievements that have defined African football this year. Leading the charge for the Player of the Year Top prize are Mohamed Salah (Egypt/Liverpool), Achraf Hakimi (Morocco/Paris Saint-Germain) and Victor Osimhen (Nigeria/Galatasaray), three of the continent’s brightest stars who have showcased their talents at the highest level.

programme.title: FIA F4 Qualifying - FIA - MAC Macau GP 2025
programme.desc: Guia Circuit packs a full FIA program—F4, Formula Regional, and GT World Cup—across Qualifying and Race sessions. Grid spots are set on a narrow 6.2 km street course before sprint-style showdowns where slipstreaming and precision through Lisboa and the Melco hairpin prove decisive. Expect factory-backed GT stars, emerging single-seater talent, safety-car-punctuated drama, and classic Macau stakes with walls inches away.

Qualifying - Valencia Round - Moto 3 - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Moto3 Valencia Round will take place at Spain’s renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo, marking the final chapter of the Moto3 season. Known for its tight corners and vibrant grandstands, the circuit will host a weekend filled with fierce competition as rising stars of the championship battle for final podium positions. Fans can expect close racing, bold overtakes, and the trademark unpredictability that defines Moto3.

programme.title: Main Race - Valencia Round - Moto 3 - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Moto3 Valencia Round will take place at Spain’s renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo, marking the final chapter of the Moto3 season. programme.title: Qualifying - Valencia Round - Moto 2 - 2025
programme.desc: The Valencia Round of the 2025 Moto2 World Championship will be staged at the renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo in Spain. As one of the final stops on the calendar, the event will bring together the category’s leading riders for an intense weekend of competition, strategy, and high-speed drama. Fans can expect thrilling on-track battles and a fitting conclusion to the Moto2 season.

programme.title: Practice 1 - F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix will light up the famous Las Vegas Strip for one of the most spectacular events of the season. Set against the city’s dazzling skyline, the race will combine speed, strategy, and spectacle as drivers battle under the lights on the fast, 6.2 km street circuit. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.

programme.desc: The UEFA Conference League is the third-tier club football tournament organised by UEFA. The new format competition runs for its second season live and exclusive only on beIN. The RB Arena in Leipzig, Germany, is the venue for the Conference League final on 27 May 2026.

programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Alcaraz - Sinner: The Dawn of a New Tennis Era
programme.desc: Alcaraz – Sinner: The Dawn of a New Tennis Era explores the rise of these two stars, their paths to the top, and how their duels are redefining the sport in the post Big Three dominance. It’s a story of legacy, ambition, and the birth of a new golden age for tennis.

programme.title: Argentina vs Germany (QF4) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Spain vs Czechia (QF3) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Argentina vs Germany (QF4) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Gemma TRIAY PONS ESP Delfina BREA SENESI ARG vs Ariana SANCHEZ FALLADA ESP Paula JOSEMARIA MARTIN ES
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: France vs Belgium (QF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
programme.desc: The 2025 Davis Cup Final 8 runs 18–23 Nov at SuperTennis Arena, Bologna Fiere (indoor hard). Eight nations—host Italy plus seven Sept qualifiers (e.g., Germany, France, Austria, Argentina)—play single-day ties of two singles and, if needed, one doubles (best-of-three rubbers). Italy, the 2023–24 champion, chases a three-peat; stars such as Alcaraz, Zverev and Musetti are expected.

programme.title: Carlos ALCARAZ (ESP) [1] vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) [2] - Nitto ATP Finals Turin - 2025
programme.desc: Set up No.1 Alcaraz vs No.2 Sinner. Pre-match, Alcaraz leads H2H 10–6 (hard 7–3, clay 3–1; Sinner edges grass 2–0). Indoor hard favors first-strike tennis and aggressive returns. Expect razor-thin margins as the season’s top two chase year-end supremacy and another chapter in a rivalry built on pace, precision, and momentum swings.

programme.title: Italy vs Uzbekistan - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Istres vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026 - PlayOff Tournament and European Play Off Draws
programme.desc: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off Draws The final pathways to the game-changing FIFA World Cup 2026™ will be mapped out when the draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and the European Play-Off draw takes place at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland. The draws will define the routes the 22 competing nations – six via the Play-Off Tournament and 16 through European Play-Off matches – will need to successfully navigate to seal a spot at the first-ever 48-team FIFA World Cup™, which will be staged in Canada, Mexico and the United States from Thursday, 11 June to Sunday, 19 July 2026.

programme.title: FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament and European Play-Off draws
programme.desc: The draw for the FIFA World Cup 2026™ Play-Off Tournament, along with the European Play-Off draw, is scheduled to occur at the Home of FIFA in Zurich, Switzerland, on Thursday, 20 November 2025. These draws will determine the routes for the 22 participating nations—six through the Play-Off Tournament and 16 via European Play-Off matches—who must successfully navigate these challenges to secure a place in the inaugural 48-team FIFA World Cup™.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: CAF Awards 2025
programme.desc: The Confédération Africaine de Football (CAF) has unveiled the Top Three Nominees in each of the Men’s Categories of the highly anticipated CAF Awards 2025. The prestigious event will be held in Rabat, Morocco, on 19 November 2025, celebrating the exceptional performances and achievements that have defined African football this year. Leading the charge for the Player of the Year Top prize are Mohamed Salah (Egypt/Liverpool), Achraf Hakimi (Morocco/Paris Saint-Germain) and Victor Osimhen (Nigeria/Galatasaray), three of the continent’s brightest stars who have showcased their talents at the highest level.

programme.title: FIA F4 Qualifying - FIA - MAC Macau GP 2025
programme.desc: Guia Circuit packs a full FIA program—F4, Formula Regional, and GT World Cup—across Qualifying and Race sessions. Grid spots are set on a narrow 6.2 km street course before sprint-style showdowns where slipstreaming and precision through Lisboa and the Melco hairpin prove decisive. Expect factory-backed GT stars, emerging single-seater talent, safety-car-punctuated drama, and classic Macau stakes with walls inches away.

Qualifying - Valencia Round - Moto 3 - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Moto3 Valencia Round will take place at Spain’s renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo, marking the final chapter of the Moto3 season. Known for its tight corners and vibrant grandstands, the circuit will host a weekend filled with fierce competition as rising stars of the championship battle for final podium positions. Fans can expect close racing, bold overtakes, and the trademark unpredictability that defines Moto3.

programme.title: Main Race - Valencia Round - Moto 3 - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Moto3 Valencia Round will take place at Spain’s renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo, marking the final chapter of the Moto3 season. Known for its tight corners and vibrant grandstands, the circuit will host a weekend filled with fierce competition as rising stars of the championship battle for final podium positions. Fans can expect close racing, bold overtakes, and the trademark unpredictability that defines Moto3.

programme.title: Qualifying - Valencia Round - Moto 2 - 2025
programme.desc: The Valencia Round of the 2025 Moto2 World Championship will be staged at the renowned Circuit Ricardo Tormo in Spain. As one of the final stops on the calendar, the event will bring together the category’s leading riders for an intense weekend of competition, strategy, and high-speed drama. Fans can expect thrilling on-track battles and a fitting conclusion to the Moto2 season.

programme.title: Main Race - Valencia Round - Moto 2 - 2025

programme.title: Practice 1 - F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix will light up the famous Las Vegas Strip for one of the most spectacular events of the season. Set against the city’s dazzling skyline, the race will combine speed, strategy, and spectacle as drivers battle under the lights on the fast, 6.2 km street circuit. With championship stakes high and the unique atmosphere of Vegas, it promises an unforgettable night of Formula 1 action.
